case_title: Azizia Steel Company Ltd. vs. Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif

allegations.main_allegation: Ownership of assets beyond known sources of income

remittances.recipient: Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif and family

prosecution_case.ownership_claim: Nawaz Sharif as beneficial owner of ASCL and HME
prosecution_case.legal_basis: Section 14(c) of the National Accountability Ordinance (NAO), 1999

defense_case.ownership_denial: Nawaz Sharif denied ownership, claiming assets belonged to Hussain Nawaz Sharif
defense_case.remittance_explanation: Gifts from Hussain Nawaz Sharif to his father
evidence_challenges: Contradictions in MLA responses from UAE

court_findings.ownership: Nawaz Sharif was the real beneficial owner of ASCL and HME
court_findings.disproportionate_assets: Assets grossly disproportionate to declared income
court_findings.failure_to_justify: No credible money trail or explanation provided
court_findings.remittances: Part of scheme to conceal ownership

sentence.disqualification: 10 years from holding public office post-release
sentence.financial_restrictions: Barred from government-backed loans for 10 years

legal_principles.statutory_presumption: Section 14(c) of NAO invoked, shifting burden of proof to accused
legal_principles.failure_to_rebut: Nawaz Sharif failed to discharge burden of proof

additional_orders.arrest_pursuit: NAB directed to pursue arrest of absconding accused
additional_orders.case_file_maintenance: Case file to remain open until apprehension
